choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Subject: Resignation - Departure from Company

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. As of today, Monday, March 23rd, 2023, I regret to inform you that I have decided to leave my position at our esteemed company. My last day with the organization will be Friday, April 17th, 2023.

During my tenure here, I have had the privilege of working alongside a talented and dedicated team. The experience has been invaluable, and I am grateful for the opportunities afforded to me during my time with this organization.

In order to ensure a smooth transition, please find below some key points that you may need to address:

1. Projects currently underway - Please provide details on any projects or tasks that I have been working on and let me know the status of these initiatives so that I can assist in ensuring they continue to progress successfully.
2. Client relationships - If there are any critical client interactions forthcoming, please keep me informed so that I can participate in those discussions as needed and ensure a smooth handover process.
3. Knowledge transfer - To facilitate a seamless transition for my replacement, I am more than happy to provide an overview of my responsibilities, share relevant documents, and offer any additional support or guidance that may be helpful during this period.

Please let me know your thoughts on these points and if there are any specific requests you may have in terms of knowledge transfer or assistance with the transition process. I am more than happy to accommodate your needs in order to ensure a smooth departure from our company.

Once again, thank you for the opportunity to work with such an outstanding organization and for your unwavering support throughout my tenure here. I will always cherish the memories created during this time and wish everyone at the company continued success in the future.

Sincerely,

[Your Full Name]
